prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to swim.
Imagine a Pokemon with a blue body and pink accents, resembling a jellyfish.
Show me a small aquatic Pokemon with unique features that help it camouflage in the water.
Generate a creature that has an adorable design and can confuse its opponents in battle.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has both water and psychic abilities.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a cute fish into a majestic sea creature.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that has a round shape and is known for its shiny body.
